tasks.instruction: Create a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD) for the Marketplace monorepo project. Analyze the requirements for a production-ready e-commerce marketplace with React frontend, NestJS microservices backend, and full DevOps setup. Include competitive analysis of similar marketplace platforms, technical specifications, user stories for buyer/vendor/admin roles, and implementation roadmap. Save the PRD as /workspace/marketplace/docs/prd.md

Design the complete system architecture for the Marketplace monorepo based on the PRD. Create detailed system design covering: monorepo structure, microservices architecture (API Gateway, Auth, Product, Order, Payment, Notification services), database schemas for each service, API specifications, authentication flow, inter-service communication patterns, Docker containerization strategy, and deployment architecture. Save the system design as /workspace/marketplace/docs/system-design.md

Implement the complete Marketplace monorepo project based on the system design. Create the full monorepo structure with React frontend (Vite + TypeScript + TailwindCSS + shadcn/ui), NestJS microservices backend (Auth, Product, Order, Payment, Notification services + API Gateway), Prisma + PostgreSQL setup, Docker Compose configuration, and all required features including authentication, product management, cart/checkout, payment integration, real-time notifications, role-based dashboards, and CI/CD setup. Ensure the project runs locally via docker-compose up with frontend at localhost:5173 and API Gateway at localhost:3000.
